content: > at home or on the go give your feet some homemade flair in these beautiful lace-and-cabled socks seaming video tutorial link in pdf 1 shown in patons kroy socks patons yarns skill level intermediate sizes to fit woman s shoe sizes 5/6 7/8-9/10 finished foot length 5/6 9 23 cm 7/8 9½ 24 cm 9/10 10½ 26 5 cm materials patons kroy socks 50 g/1 75 oz 152 m/166 yds muslin 55008 1 1-1 ball this seems like wishful thinking-recommend two skeins set of four size 2 75 mm u s 2 double pointed knitting needles cable needle panel pattern 17 stitches 6 row grafting diagram is provided in pdf download september 2012 video tutorial available how to seam kitchener stitch 2 1 http //www youtube com/watch v=jexykxmd_t8 2 http //www youtube com/watch v=jexykxmd_t8
